text: Sir Ninian Martin Stephen, (15 June 1923 â€“ 29 October 2017) was an Australian jurist, civil servant, and politician. He served as the 20th Governor-General of Australia and as a Justice in the High Court of Australia. Stephen died in Melbourne on 29 October 2017, aged 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * Supreme Court of Victoria Website * The Bob Hawke Prime Ministerial Centre website Category:1923 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Governors-general of Australia Category:Australian judges Category:Australian civil servants Category:People from Oxfordshire
title: Ninian Stephen
